section-title.title: Contact
section-title.resumeMe: Hi everyone, in this section I will present all my educational and professional experiences in order to make myself known. I am a software developer with a humanistic background but that hasn't stopped me from becoming who I am now.
section-title.presento: I'm a universitary student enrolled to the second year of Ingegneria e Scienze Informatiche in Cesena. I'm a web and software developer.
section-title.what: During my universitary study, I practiced different languages. Some of them linked to site web and others linked to develop applications.

contentAbout.des: When designing a site you need to think of it in a way that is easy for the customer to understand and use. That is what I always try to do first.

contentResume.apprendimento: Learning of foreign languages, especially English, Spanish and French.
contentResume.soggiorni: Short travel education abroad that have given me the ability to relate to people in a foreign language.
contentResume.BSc: Bachelor's Degree in Computer science and Engineering - DISI

contentResume.MSc: Master's Degree in Computer science and Engineering - DISI

row.name: Alessia Cerami
row.subject: Enter the subject
row.dataMsgSbj: Please enter at least 2 chars of subject
row.aim: The aim of the project is to create a digital version of the famous board game Risk (RisiKo! In Italy). This variant, called Riskala, maintains the same rules and mechanics as the original game except for the roll of the dice, which is managed automatically to speed up interaction with the user.
row.title: Kitchen BLOG
row.aim2: Kitchen BLOG is a web platform through which users can actively participate, wherever they are, in the preparation of a recipe. Its goal is to allow communication, both through messages that video, in real time between two or more network users. The web platform makes full use of a project open-source based on HTML5 and JavaScript. The use of WebRTC technology was necessary and useful to set up peer-to-peer connections.
row.aim3: The purpose of this project is to educate each of us about proper nutrition. This objective is pursued by giving the user the information in terms of environmental and caloric impact of the foods that he will insert daily at every meal.
row.aim4: The purpose of this project is to show to possible clients a biological farm. A silmple site realized with the framework Vuejs and using bootstrap. This site is hosted into Netlify with a registered domain.
